node.text:
Classy rooms, elaborate buffets, happy hours, spa time and then add to this the beautiful sights & cultural escapades in God’s Own Country. The perfect holiday getaway awaits you at The Raviz Kovalam.

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
